title: 355 - We Frankicking
description:
In this episode, the guys discuss knowing your value & when to charge for your service or product and share principles that will help you earn your financial freedom.

Don’t miss your opportunity to leverage. 

12:25 - “Don’t charge because people are charging. Make sure you have something that’s worth it an sustainable first.”


16:08 - “Provide value where there’s not.” Seek opportunities where you can provide a solution to a problem.


19:39  - “Rushing the process will slow down your growth process.”


39:43 - “Desperation can effect your decision making




Takeaways

Use your income to invest in opportunities that can propel your current leverage. 

Give up, to go up.

Let your value speak for itself.


Questions


What’s the last life decision that you’ve made?  

What can you guarantee in the value that you’re proposing to companies?


Listener Perks


Organifi Is giving our listeners up to 20% off of their order! Just go to www.organifi.com/success. Support your journey from sunrise to sunset with fan-favorite superfoods backed by science to replenish micronutrients, support energy and balance hormones from am to pm with our customer favorites.


Indeed Indeed makes it easy to hire great talent. According to ComScore, Indeed is the #1 job site worldwide. • Start hiring RIGHT NOW with a SEVENTY-FIVE DOLLAR SPONSORED JOB CREDIT to upgrade your first job post at Indeed.com/SUCCESS . Go to Indeed.com/SUCCESS to claim your SEVENTY-FIVE DOLLAR CREDIT NOW.



Mizzen + Main provides high quality fabric clothing for comfort you can feel and performance you can trust. Enjoy performance fabric modern tailored clothes that are comfortable, lightweight, breathable, moisture wicking, and machine washable. You can also get recommended options from the website from answering a few questions that fits your preferred style! with modern tailoring. Head over to www.mizzenandmain.com to receive $25 dollars off any order of $130 or more along with free shipping over orders of $100 with free returns.


Titan - Growing your long-term wealth isn’t something you can just DIY, and you shouldn’t just sit back and shoot for average returns. With Titan, YOU have a personal investment team that researches and invests for you so that you can aim to outperform the market, while giving you a courtside seat to become a smarter investor along the way. Head to titan.com/success to get a free $25 investment in the Ark Venture fund thats apart of the flagship portfolio.
